actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University certain lands of the United States of America at Fort Pickett, Va.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State university specified lands of the United States of America at Fort Pickett, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University certain lands of the United States of America at Fort Pickett, Va.
